Hi. [chuckles]
I'm Kassandra. I'm 27, and I'm single. [chuckles]
translation.it: Mi chiamo Kassandra. Ho 27 anni e sono single.

translation.en: [Cian] Have you ever been in love?
I don't know. I-- I know I love my family.
translation.it: Non lo so. So di amare la mia famiglia.

translation.en: I know I love my friends,
but I don't know what intimate love is yet.
translation.it: ma non so cosa sia l'amore per un'altra persona.

translation.en: I've read books,
both fiction and nonfiction,
about what love should be,
but I don't know if I've ever been in love.
translation.it: ma non so se sono mai stata innamorata.

translation.en: [Cian] How would you describe yourself?
Weird.
And I love being weird.
I've got a jar of teeth. [chuckles]

They are my teeth and my siblings'.

translation.en: I love my plush toys.
I have received a few of these from previous partners.

translation.en: 'cause we were meant to be a set.
Didn't work out very well. I haven't been very lucky in love,

translation.en: but, um, I've kept them. They're a little bit precious to me.
translation.it: Però li ho tenuti comunque. Ci sono affezionata.

translation.en: And it's my brain that's different.

translation.en: [Cian] When you were younger, was there a point where you started
translation.it: Da piccola, ti sei mai sentita diversa dai tuoi compagni di scuola?

translation.en: to feel like you were different to the other kids at school?
translation.it: ti sei mai sentita diversa dai tuoi compagni di scuola?

translation.en: It would've been about grade four, maybe grade five.
I remember looking up and realizing that kids sat in groups,
translation.it: Guardando gli altri bambini, ho notato che sedevano in gruppi

translation.en: but I sat on my own.
translation.it: mentre io mi sedevo da sola.

translation.en: And I remember that week trying to sit in with the group,
translation.it: Così ho provato a unirmi al gruppo

translation.en: and it was awful.
And I remember that week going, "I am not the same,"
translation.it: Ed è stato allora che ho capito di essere diversa

translation.en: and it wouldn't be for three and a half years later for me to get diagnosed.
translation.it: e la diagnosi di autismo è arrivata solo tre anni e mezzo dopo.

translation.en: [Cian] How did you feel when you were diagnosed?
I was happy.
Having someone tell me that,
"No, this is what it is,
and there are thousands of other people like you,"
translation.it: e ci sono milioni di persone come te nel mondo",

translation.en: it made me feel human again.
translation.it: mi ha fatto sentire di nuovo umana.

translation.en: I didn't feel completely outcast anymore.
translation.it: Non mi sentivo più un'emarginata totale.

translation.en: I still think it's probably one of the best days of my life.
translation.it: È stato uno dei giorni più belli della mia vita.

translation.en: This is my games room.
A few years back, one of our concerts, we had a Kylie Minogue theme,
translation.it: Qualche anno fa ci siamo vestite da Kylie Minogue

translation.en: and, uh, my sister wore this one.
I'm planning to repurpose it into a new cosplay.
translation.it: Voglio riciclarlo per un nuovo costume cosplay.

translation.en: Um, I haven't decided exactly which character.
translation.it: Non ho ancora deciso quale personaggio.

translation.en: So this is one of my, um, prop daggers.
translation.it: E questo è uno dei miei pugnali di scena.

translation.en: I also have this one. "Winter is coming."
It sits perfectly on me.
translation.it: È perfetta per la mia altezza.

translation.en: Cosplay is dressing up as your favorite characters
translation.it: Nel cosplay ci si traveste dai propri personaggi preferiti

translation.en: and bringing them to life.
It helps with going into social situations.
translation.it: Mi aiuta ad affrontare le situazioni sociali

translation.en: I don't have to be me.
translation.it: perché non devo essere me stessa.

translation.en: I can be another character,
and there's a lot less stress
on being those characters than being myself.
One of the biggest things I've had to learn is what people call masking,
translation.it: Nel tempo ho imparato a indossare delle maschere,

translation.en: pretending and hiding the parts of me that don't fit neurotypical society.
translation.it: a nascondere parti di me che sono incompatibili con la società neurotipica.

translation.en: In a perfect world,
no, I wouldn't have to learn how to word things
so a neurotypical person doesn't find offense where there is none to be had,
translation.it: in un modo che non offenda la sensibilità dei neurotipici,

translation.en: but we don't live in a perfect world.
translation.it: ma non viviamo in un mondo ideale.

translation.en: -I missed you guys. -We missed you too!
translation.it: Mi siete mancate. Anche tu ci sei mancata.

translation.en: So I'm thinking of starting dating again.
translation.it: Vorrei riprendere a uscire con qualcuno.

translation.en: -[Kassandra] Yeah. -Awesome.
What kind of person would you like to meet?
translation.it: Che tipo di persona vorresti incontrare?

translation.en: Um, someone that's kind of…
translation.it: Che tipo di persona vorresti incontrare? Qualcuno che è come...

translation.en: kind of like us, but not 100% like us.
-Yeah. -I think the same here.
Otherwise I probably would've dated one of you guys, and that would've been weird.
translation.it: A quel punto uscirei con una di voi e sarebbe strano.

translation.en: But I guess definitely not clingy.
translation.it: Ma non voglio un tipo appiccicoso.

translation.en: You remember the last time I dated someone who was clingy.
They wanted to, like, text me morning and night.
Like, "good morning and good night" every day.
[woman] You just want someone to encourage your dreams,
translation.it: Vuoi che ti incoraggi a sognare

translation.en: and you encourage theirs and push each other to your goals.
translation.it: che ti spinga lottare per i tuoi obiettivi.

translation.en: [Kassandra] That would be so good.
[chuckles] It's just difficult to find, especially as an autistic adult.
translation.it: Ma non è facile trovarlo, soprattutto per un'autistica adulta.

translation.en: Like, if you tell people that outright, half the time they'll judge you
translation.it: Perché quando lo dici a quelli con cui esci, ti giudicano

translation.en: and think you've been keeping it secret.
I think someone who's gonna understand you.
-You need that. -Not-- not just a little bit of you. -Like, the whole you. -Whole of you.
translation.it: - Ne hai bisogno. - Non una parte di te, ma tutta te stessa.

translation.en: They'd also have to, like, fit in with you guys enough.
translation.it: E dovrebbe andare d'accordo con voi.

translation.en: They'll have to do, like, the nerd 101 test.
translation.it: Deve superare il test Principi di nerditudine.

translation.en: This is gonna be good.
Like, I've got my wing person.
I've got my buddies.
-I will do it. I will find someone. -We're your cheering squad. Whoo!
translation.it: - Troverò qualcuno. - Faremo il tifo per te.

translation.en: [Cian] When it comes to dating, what's your greatest fear?
translation.it: Cosa ti spaventa di più quando conosci una donna?

translation.en: [exhales] Rejection.
There's nothing more terrifying to me on this earth than a life doomed to loneliness.
translation.it: Non c'è niente che mi spaventi di più della solitudine.

translation.en: It's almost like feeling like an abandoned toy left in the closet
translation.it: Ci si sente come un giocattolo dimenticato nel ripostiglio

translation.en: while all the other toys are out being played with.
translation.it: mentre gli altri giocattoli si divertono.

translation.en: Much like how Woody was in Toy Story 4 when he was left in the closet.
translation.it: Come Woody in Toy Story 4 quando lo abbandonano.

translation.en: That's exactly how I feel a lot.
translation.it: È così che mi sento spesso.

-[host] How are you? -Good. Yourself?
-Do you wanna take a seat? -[Michael] Thank you.
-Hello. How are you? -[Michael] Hello. Good. Yourself?
Well, thank you.

I like how the tie matches the handkerchief.

Voice acting or watching television.

-Oh. -Yeah, you get hooked on to a cable. And you get pulled around,

translation.en: -[clinking] -All right, everyone.
-It was really nice to meet you, Michael. -Likewise, Amelia. Take care.
translation.it: - È stato un piacere. - Anche per me.

-Nice to meet you, Taylor. -[chuckles] You too.
Your-- your top looks abs-- absolutely amazing.

translation.en: Thank you. [chuckles]
-And so does your hair color. -Thank you.
translation.it: - E il colore dei capelli. - Grazie.

translation.en: Do you mind if I ask what year you were born?

translation.en: Uh, 1996. Two years after me.
translation.it: - Nel 1996. - Due anni dopo di me.

translation.en: -[Taylor] Really? -Yeah.
Have you traveled a lot?
I've only been to Germany and Hawaii.

translation.en: How did you like it?
-I'm actually a Germanophile. -Yeah?
A Germanophile is somebody that loves German things.

translation.en: Very nice.
I'm also a bit of an Anglophile.
-So you love English culture? -Yeah.

translation.en: -What's your favorite? -Their cheeses.

Rosamund Pike, Jack Davenport.

All right, everyone move on to your next date.
All the men to the right.
I actually really enjoyed my time with you. [Taylor] Thank you. I did too.

translation.en: -[woman] Hi. -Hello.
-[chuckles] I'm Tori. -I'm-- I'm Michael.
-Lovely to meet you. [chuckles] -Likewise.
So what do you do for a living?
I am a mom.
Of a four-year-old girl named Brynne.

translation.en: -Ah. Nice. -Yeah.
-Are you a single mother? -I am a single mother.
How does-- how does that feel?
It feels good.
Good to be out of a relationship that didn't work.
translation.it: Meglio single che in una relazione che non funzionava.

translation.en: -That's understandable. -[chuckles] Yeah.
Do you watch television much?
[chuckles] I don't have a TV at home.
translation.it: Non ho la TV a casa.

translation.en: -[chuckles] -That sucks.
I think it's great.
Do you know much about astrology and star signs?
-No, not too much. -Oh.
-[chuckles] -[host] Everyone on to their next date.
[Tori] See you. Lovely to meet you. -Likewise, Tori. Take care. -[chuckles]
translation.it: - È stato un piacere. - Anche per me.

translation.en: [narrator] Ronan has been volunteering for three years at Sydney Motorsport Park.
translation.it: Da tre anni Ronan lavora come volontario al Sydney Motorsport Park.

translation.en: I know it's loud, but even so, it's, like, quite exciting.
translation.it: So che c'è tanto rumore, ma mi piace un sacco lo stesso.

translation.en: You hear the cars just, like, go zooming past.
translation.it: Senti le auto che ti sfrecciano davanti.

translation.en: Like, you're on the edge of your seat
translation.it: E tu sei lì, col fiato sospeso,

translation.en: enjoying the wild ride.
translation.it: a goderti lo spettacolo della corsa.

translation.en: Fifty. Yeah, I've got 50 there.
I check the drivers off in their correct position.
translation.it: Verifico la posizione dei piloti nella griglia di partenza.

translation.en: It's like if-- if something isn't right, I-- I go over to the driver and ask.
translation.it: E se qualcosa non va, vado a parlare con i piloti.

translation.en: [driver] Nah, mate, this is my spot. This is my starting position.
translation.it: No, questa è la mia posizione di partenza.

translation.en: -This is where I'm starting-- -[Ronan] Sorry, like, this is the law.
translation.it: - È la nostra... - Scusate, le regole sono chiare.

translation.en: -I cannot accept it. -[driver] I'm not moving.
Corey! Corey!
-Come quick. -[Corey] Yeah.
What's the problem?
[Ronan] Car 351 is in the wrong position. [Corey] Well, that's where he's qualified to.
translation.it: - L'auto 351 è nella posizione sbagliata. - Si è qualificato per un'altra posizione.

translation.en: You gotta tell him. If he doesn't go now, we are gonna call race control. Simple as that.
translation.it: Se non si sposta, chiamiamo i supervisori. Semplice.

translation.en: -[Ronan] Yeah. -[Corey] All right?
[Ronan] Sorry, but if you don't move down, I'll have to call race control.
translation.it: Scusa, ma se non ti sposti, dovrò chiamare i supervisori.

translation.en: [driver] Aww, jeez, man. All right.
[Corey] Well done. Well done.
I spoke to him respectfully and said,
"I'm sorry, but this grid sheet is where you need to be."
translation.it: "Mi spiace, ma devi spostarti su questa posizione nella griglia".

translation.en: Like, really, I showed-- I showed bravery inside me.
I-- I just showed myself I was boss.
translation.it: Gli ho fatto capire che qui comando io.

translation.en: -Hello. [chuckles] -[Michael] Hello.
-I'm Jess. -I'm Michael.
-Nice to meet you. -Nice to meet you as well.
So do you go out much?
Um, spend time with friends whenever I get the chance,

-What kind of food do you like? -Italian or German.

Schnitzels, bratwurst, kranskys.
I love food. [laughs]
Tell me about it.
I went on holiday a while back,
and I just ate my way through the whole holiday.

translation.en: There's so much amazing food outside of Australia.

translation.en: -Where did you go? -I went to Europe.
Where in Europe?
I went to Germany, to England and a few other places. [chuckles]

translation.en: Ah, I'd love to visit England.
It's cold. [laughs] It's really cold.
So I've heard, yeah.
Do you have any hobbies?
I like watching movies.
-Like what? -I like horror movies.
-Oh. -Yeah. [chuckles]
I also like to watch a lot of thrillers and, um, psychological movies, but…
translation.it: Mi piacciono anche thriller e gialli, ma...

translation.en: -Creepy. -Yeah.
Lovely to talk to you. -Nice to meet you too. -And meeting you as well.
translation.it: - È stato un piacere. - Anche per me.

translation.en: -Enjoy the rest of your dates. -Thank you. Thanks.
translation.it: - Goditi il resto della serata. - Grazie.

translation.en: -Good luck with the other gentlemen. -You too. [chuckles] Take care.
translation.it: - Buona fortuna con gli altri signori. - Anche a te.

translation.en: -Hello. -[woman] Hi.
-How are you? -I'm good. Yourself?
I'm--
I'm good. [chuckles]
That's good. I'm Michael.
-Nice to meet you. I'm Heather. -Nice to meet you, Heather.
Do you mind if I ask what year you were born?
translation.it: Posso chiederti in che anno sei nata?

translation.en: One year after me.
You're 26?
Yep.
And, um…
Uh, try and think of a question.
[inhales] My mind's at a crossroads.
Um, what are your hobbies?
Watching television shows,
spiritual activities, like meditation, maybe yoga.
I also wanna start learning how to do tai chi.
translation.it: Presto vorrei iniziare a fare Tai chi.

translation.en: -Oh, cool. -Yeah.
What about you?
I like watching Netflix.
Um, have you been overseas before? Yeah, I went to England and Germany.
translation.it: - Sei mai stata all'estero? - Sono stata in Inghilterra e in Germania.

translation.en: I've been to Germany twice. That's cool.
translation.it: - Sono stato due volte in Germania. - Forte.

translation.en: -But I'd love to visit England. -It's a beautiful place, as well.
translation.it: - Ma mi piacerebbe visitare l'Inghilterra. - È bella.

translation.en: -Love their culture. -Yeah.
All the roast ch-- roast lamb and beef and-- yeah.
translation.it: Sì, l'agnello al forno, il roast beef...

translation.en: It's amazing.
Yeah.
And I gotta say, you look absolutely amazing.
translation.it: Devo dirtelo, mi piace il tuo stile.

translation.en: Thank you.
Your clothes, your glasses, your hairstyle.
translation.it: I vestiti, gli occhiali, la pettinatura.

translation.en: Thank you.
You look amazing too.
Thank you. I love dressing like this anyway.
[chuckles] That's cool.
Do you watch television shows much?
I'm sad to admit that I watch The Bachelor.
-The Bachelor? -Yeah.
Never saw that.
The women out on there, they're horrible. Very nasty.
translation.it: Le donne che partecipano sono cattivissime.

translation.en: Yeah. So… hmm.
I should also tell you that I'm actually on the spectrum.
translation.it: Vorrei dirti che sono nello spettro.

translation.en: -Hmm. -The autism spectrum.
I'm on the spectrum too.
I know, like, all the stuff about Harry Potter… -Ah. -…Star Wars.
translation.it: So tutto di Harry Potter, Guerre stellari.

translation.en: So I get hooked onto things easily.
-Yeah, same. -Yeah.
[host] All right, that is it. We are done!
translation.it: Bene. La serata si conclude qui.

translation.en: Thanks for your time, Heather.
-Thank you for your time too. -[Michael] No problem.
translation.it: - Grazie a te. - È stato un piacere.

translation.en: -See you later. -Enjoy your night.
-[chuckles] Thank you. -Thanks. Good luck.
[narrator] At the end of the event, the singles choose who they'd like to see again.
translation.it: Dopo l'evento, i single scelgono chi vorrebbero rivedere.

translation.en: They will only be matched if the other person also chooses them.
translation.it: Usciranno con chi scelgono solo se anche quella persona li ha scelti.

translation.en: I've ticked Taylor and Jessica.
translation.it: Ho messo la x su Taylor e Jessica.

translation.en: I'm not gonna go for Tori.
And Amelia? Not really.
translation.it: E neanche Amelia mi piace molto.

translation.en: Heather, I've ticked her as well.
-[Cian] Are you happy with your decision? -Yep, definitely.
translation.it: - Sei soddisfatto delle tue scelte? - Sì, molto.

translation.en: Anna, here's the list. The lucky list!
translation.it: - Anna, la mia lista. - La lista delle fortunate!

translation.en: -Thank you so much for coming. -No problem.
-I'll give you a call tonight? -[Michael] Sure. Thank you.
-Take care of yourself. See ya. -[Anna] You too, Michael. Bye-bye.
[Cian] Do you have any rules for dating?
translation.it: Hai delle regole per gli incontri?

translation.en: Pay full respect to a girl.
Make eye contact.
Make sure your body language is positive.
translation.it: Usare un linguaggio del corpo positivo.

translation.en: Most importantly, enjoy your lovable activities together.
translation.it: E soprattutto, divertirsi insieme a lei.

translation.en: I always want to do the right thing,
translation.it: Voglio sempre fare tutto per bene.

translation.en: but really, like, one thing I do know,
I have heard about-- about Jodi, like, you know, Jodi, the dating coach? [Cian] Mm-hmm.
translation.it: Ho sentito parlare di Jodi, l'esperta di relazioni.

translation.en: Like, yeah, she'll…
-She'll possibly teach me a lot. -[Cian] Yeah, if you wanna see her.
translation.it: So che lei potrebbe insegnarmi molte cose. - Sì, se pensi che ti possa aiutare. - Sì.

translation.en: -You think that would that be helpful? -Yeah, it would be helpful.
translation.it: - Sì, se pensi che ti possa aiutare. - Sì. Sì, credo che potrebbe darmi un sacco di consigli utili.

translation.en: Because then I would be given a few-- lots of tips.
translation.it: Sì, credo che potrebbe darmi un sacco di consigli utili.

translation.en: [narrator] Jodi Rodgers is a relationship specialist who works with autistic adults,
translation.it: Jodi Rodgers è un'esperta di relazioni che aiuta le persone autistiche

translation.en: helping them in their search for love.
Hello, I'm Jodi.
-I'm Ronan. -Lovely to meet you.
-Is it okay if I come in? -[Ronan] Pleasure. Yeah. Definitely.
[Jodi] We're not born with social skills.
translation.it: Le capacità relazionali non sono innate.

translation.en: We are taught social skills. We're taught greetings.
translation.it: Le apprendiamo. Ci insegnano a presentarci.

translation.en: We're taught how to have a back-and-forth conversation.
translation.it: Ci insegnano ad intavolare una conversazione bidirezionale.

translation.en: -Jodi, this is my mom. -Yes.
translation.it: - Jodi, questa è mia madre. - Sì.

translation.en: -My mom Linda. -Hi, Jodi. I'm Linda…
[Jodi] Some people have much more innate ability to pick up social skills quickly,
translation.it: Alcuni hanno una velocità innata nell'apprendere a socializzare

translation.en: and for many autistic people, learning social skills is not easy.
translation.it: ma per molte persone autistiche, socializzare non è facile.

translation.en: Here's your chair, Jodi.
[laughs] Thank you.
We also have to remember that autism is as diverse
in people's need for support from others
translation.it: richiede livelli di supporto molto diversi

translation.en: as it is in its presentation itself.
translation.it: perché si presenta in forme molto diverse.

translation.en: So what things did you want help with today?
'Cause I hear that you might be going on your first date? -The first date, yeah. -[gasps]
translation.it: - Presto avrai il tuo primo appuntamento. - Esatto.

translation.en: So I've never been on a date before, but--
translation.it: Non sono mai uscito con una ragazza,

translation.en: but really, this is like something for me to achieve on,
translation.it: ma per me sarebbe un traguardo importante

translation.en: like a relationship as boyfriend and girlfriend.
translation.it: riuscire ad avere una relazione con una ragazza.

translation.en: So when you think about having a girlfriend,
what does that mean to you?
It means, like, I feel warm and comfortable.
translation.it: Significa sentirmi a casa con lei, in un posto accogliente,

translation.en: There's no any problems, that you're happy and calm.
translation.it: dove non ci sono problemi e io sono calmo e felice.

translation.en: Tell you what, I wish there was no problems.
translation.it: Purtroppo i problemi fanno parte delle relazioni.

translation.en: When you have a girlfriend, there's still problems.
translation.it: I problemi ci sono anche con le ragazze.

translation.en: -Still problems? -Still problems.
translation.it: - Ci sono problemi? -Sì, ce ne sono.

translation.en: -Having a girlfriend's a beautiful thing. -[Ronan] Yeah.
translation.it: - Avere la ragazza è bellissimo. - Sì.

translation.en: But it doesn't make everything perfect.
You have to really try with another person.
It's all about looking after one another, and all of that can be really, really hard work.
translation.it: Ci si deve prendere cura dell'altro ed è un lavoro impegnativo.

translation.en: -Yeah. -But it's like driving the fastest car on the hardest track.
translation.it: È come guidare un'auto velocissima su una pista super difficile.

translation.en: Yeah.
Would you say, "No, no, I don't wanna do that because it's too hard,"
translation.it: Cosa ne dici? Vuoi rinunciarci perché è troppo difficile

translation.en: or would you be brave and give it a go?
translation.it: o vuoi essere coraggioso e provarci?

translation.en: I would be brave and give it a go.
That's just what building a relationship's like.
Yeah.
If you go on your very first date,
how do you think you're gonna feel on your first date?
translation.it: il giorno del tuo primo appuntamento?

translation.en: Well, most people would feel a bit nervous.
Yeah.
But I'm brave and-- and I'm excited, like--
translation.it: Ma io sono coraggioso e non vedo l'ora

translation.en: like, doing something new and special that I've never done before.
translation.it: di fare qualcosa di nuovo, che non ho mai fatto prima.

translation.en: That is so excellent.
That is such a good way to think about the world.
translation.it: È un ottimo atteggiamento nella vita.

translation.en: So what do you think that you need help from me with,
translation.it: E come credi che io potrei aiutarti

translation.en: if you're brave and excited?
translation.it: se sei pronto per questa sfida?

translation.en: So, really, like, something for me to learn
on having a date is, like, conversation driving,
as in showing a lot of interest
and you're involved, and you wanna discuss more.
translation.it: e la voglia di approfondire la conversazione.

translation.en: I reckon we should have a bit of a practice, you and me,
translation.it: Credo che insieme potremmo fare un po' di pratica

translation.en: just at how you'll get-- how you could keep the conversation going.
translation.it: Credo che insieme potremmo fare un po' di pratica su come mantenere una conversazione.

translation.en: Or maybe you can pretend you're going on a picnic together.
translation.it: Fate finta di andare a un picnic insieme.

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Jodi] Come into the kitchen.
-Is that all right? -Yeah.
[Jodi] So, if you and I pretend we're outside and we're actually at the picnic,
translation.it: Facciamo finta di fare un picnic insieme.

translation.en: what activities will you do on the picnic?
translation.it: Cosa si fa durante un picnic?

translation.en: There's, like, Frisbee.
So you have a conversation about the Frisbee with me.
-Get me in on the conversation. -Yeah.
Like, do you like playing Frisbee?
Yes.
